title: Les Mysteres de Paris = the Mysteries of Paris
abstract: Note: Adapted from the book by Eugene Sue.
description: Rodolphe de Sombreuil runs over a poor man in the street and promises he will look after his young daughter. Sombreuil disguises himself as a working-class man and goes looking for Fleur de Marie who has been kidnapped by shady underworld characters. He is appalled by the squalor in which people live in the depressing working class slums.  Credits: Producer, Paul Cadeac ; director, Andre Hunebelle ; writer, Jean Halain ; photography, Marcel Grignon ; music, Jean Marion. Cast: Jean Marais, Dany Robin, Raymond Pellegrin, Jill Hayworth, Pierre Mondy, Madeleine Barbulee, Paulette Dubost, Jean Le Poulain, Noel Roquevert.
